name: Wheat Oat Flax Bread. Wheat Oats Flaxseed Everyday Sandwich Loaf.
description: Wheat Oat Flax Bread. Another healthy multigrain sandwich loaf and great for snacks. Delicious and Easy. Vegan Recipe.

recipeInstructions.text: Warm half a cup (120ml) of water and add sugar and yeast to it. Mix well
recipeInstructions.name: Warm half a cup (120ml) of water and add sugar and yeast to it. Mix well

recipeInstructions.text: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: In another half cup of water, boil the cracked wheat for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In another half cup of water, boil the cracked wheat for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Coarsely blend the flax seeds and oats and add to the boiling cracked wheat mixture. Mix well and switch off and cool.
recipeInstructions.name: Coarsely blend the flax seeds and oats and add to the boiling cracked wheat mixture. Mix well and switch off and cool.

recipeInstructions.text: In a greased mixing bowl, add the flours, salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a greased mixing bowl, add the flours, salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oil, yeast mixture, oats wheat mixture and and knead for 8-10 minutes. ( if using stand mixer, 3-4 minute batches with intermittent scraping)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the oil, yeast mixture, oats wheat mixture and and knead for 8-10 minutes. ( if using stand mixer, 3-4 minute batches with intermittent scraping)

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a well greased container, covered in a warm place for 2 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a well greased container, covered in a warm place for 2 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly punch the dough and using a little flour knead and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under.
recipeInstructions.name: Lightly punch the dough and using a little flour knead and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under.

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with damp towel. Let rise for an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with damp towel. Let rise for an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 375 degrees F for about 40 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 375 degrees F for about 40 minutes.

keywords: everyday bread recipe, multigrain bread, vegan bread recipe
